effects.name: Ember
effects.description: Hits burn enemies for 30% of hit damage over 3s.

effects.name: Frost
effects.description: Hits slow enemies by 30% for 2s. Deal 20% more damage to Slowed enemies.

effects.name: Venom
effects.description: Hits poison enemies for 40% of hit damage over 4s. Deal 15% more damage to Poisoned enemies.

effects.name: Executioner
effects.description: Enemies below 25% HP take double damage.
